:::{.callout-caution}
## Content incomplete

This page will introduce generic utilities.
:::


-  VectorAlignments.jl: see [documentation](https://neelsmith.github.io/VectorAlignments.jl/stable/)
- [`Lectionary.jl`](http://neelsmith.quarto.pub/lectionary): a Julia package for coordinating the liturgical calendar year with the Gregorian civil calendar and with the readings from the Revised Common Lectionary (RCL).
- `Parashah.jl`: a Julia package for coordinating readings of the Parashat HaShavua with the representation of the Hebrew calendar implemented in `Calendars.jl`.
